attributes.action: bring FDL week back to KEGS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At KEGS, Chelmsford, we have a Fleur De Lys week which is where we do all sorts of crazy and fun events that raise money for charity but this year our headteacher has cancelled it therefore losing around £5000 for charity. On top of that, he has disbanded ther FDL, who organise many smaller events during the year for charity. We want FDL back!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
